content: crochet tunic nizza design martina taborsky size 34-38 chest max 88 90 cm hip cca 90 cm yarn linie 164 java fy online 67% cotton 37% rayon 158 m/50 g crochet hook nr 2-2 5 cca 450 g colour 01 white gauge 1 motif is cca 5 x 5 cm the tunic is made till armholes in rounds in one piece than we devide the work and make back and front separately we begin from the bottom which is made from motifs schema nr 1 which we join together during the work in the corner with chain 5 on the side with chain 3 motif chain 6 join with slip_stitch in ring 1 row 12 double_crochet 2 row chain 3 *chain 2 1 double_crochet* from * till * repeat 10 times more chain 2 3 row *chain 3 4 double_crochet in chain-2 space * chain 5 skip next chain-2 space 5 double_crochet in next chain-2 space chain 2 skip next chain-2 space 5 double_crochet in next chain-2 space* from * till * repeat 2 times more chain 5 skip next chain-2 space 5 double_crochet in next chain-2 space chain 3 skip last chain-2 space lower edge trim is made by joining motifs bottom row is made from 15 motifs joined in ring 2 and 3 row of motifs we join alternately 4 row is made only from half motifs schema nr 2 and then we begin to crochet directly in the upper part of the last row the bodice of the tunic schema nr 3 1 row double_crochet across 2 row chain 3 = * 1 double_crochet chain 2 skip 2 double_crochet previous row * from * till * across the whole row 3 row chain 3 6 double_crochet in chain 2 skip next chain-2 space single_crochet in next chain-2 space chain 5 skip next chain-2 space single_crochet in next chain-2 space * 7 double_crochet in next chain-2 space skip next chain-2 space single_crochet in next chain-2 space chain 5 skip next chain-2 space single_crochet in next chain-2 space from * across the whole row 4 row chain 2 = * 1 single_crochet in 2 double_crochet chain 3 1 single_crochet in 5 double_crochet chain 3 1 single_crochet in chain-5 space from * across the whole row 5 row * chain 3 6 double_crochet in chain-3 space 1 single_crochet in next chain-3 space chain 5 1 single_crochet in next chain-3 space *7 double_crochet in next chain-3 space 1 single_crochet in next chain-3 space chain 5 1 single_crochet in next chain-3 space from * across the whole row 6 řada chain 3 = 1 double_crochet in first double_crochet chain 2 1 double_crochet in 5 double_crochet chain 2 1 double_crochet in chain-5 space * 1 double_crochet in first double_crochet chain 2 1 double_crochet in 5 double_crochet chain 2 1 double_crochet in chain-5 space from * across the whole row then we crochet the bodice as following 1 row *in first 8 2-chain spaces 2 double_crochet = 16 double_crochet in next 2-chain space chain
